# SY21-22 End of Year Reports

<br>

<center>

Passwords for Reports are <a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eAUdWEzc0R7WzpztOvutRp2FYDtpks37LSFV8sq8ezg/edit?usp=sharing" target="_blank">here</a> which will only be viewable if you are a Teaching Lab employee. Different tabs within the spreadsheet contain the passwords for each year.

</center>

<br>

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)
report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c("All Sites",
               "Amistad Dual Language, NY",
               "Delaware Department of Education, DE",
               "NYC District 9 - District-wide, NY",
               "San Diego Unified School District, CA"),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Reports/2021-2022/final_report_all_sites.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/2021-2022/final_report_amistad_dual_language__ny.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/2021-2022/final_report_delaware_department_of_education__de.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/2021-2022/final_report_nyc_district_9___district_wide__ny.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/2021-2022/final_report_san_diego_unified_school_district__ca.png")),
  link = c("Reports/2022Reports/Final/final_report_all_sites.html",
           "Reports/2022Reports/Final/final_report_amistad_dual_language__ny.html",
           "Reports/2022Reports/Final/final_report_delaware_department_of_education__de.html",
           "Reports/2022Reports/Final/final_report_nyc_district_9___district_wide__ny.html",
           "Reports/2022Reports/Final/final_report_san_diego_unified_school_district__ca.html")
)

report_galleries %>%
  cards(
    title = "End of\nYear Report",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "label-right",
    spacing = 3
  )
```
